levels.description:
Passive Effect: Drone <@ba.vup>+1</>
<@ba.rem>Active Effect: Can switch between the default state and the following state:</>
ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, releases Drones to lock and attack non-mobile enemies across the entire battlefield, searching for a new target if the enemy moves or is defeated
